:mod:`plots_scheduler`
======================

.. py:module:: plots_scheduler


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   plots_scheduler.charge_observatories
   plots_scheduler.airmass_plot_saved
   plots_scheduler.airmass_plot_proposition
   plots_scheduler.airmass_altitude_plot_saved
   plots_scheduler.airmass_altitude_plot_proposition

   plots_scheduler.gantt_chart

   plots_scheduler.constraints_scores


.. function:: charge_observatories(Name)

   charge the observatory

   :param Name: Name of the observatory
   :type Name: str

   :returns: list of the observatory
   :rtype: list


.. function:: airmass_plot_saved(name_observatory, telescope, day)

   :param name_observatory: name of the observatory (ex : 'SSO')
   :type name_observatory: str
   :param telescope: name of the telescope (exx : 'Io')
   :type telescope: str
   :param day: date of day in fmt "yyyy-mm-dd"
   :type day: date

   :returns: visibility plot on telescope at a given day
   :rtype: plot


.. function:: airmass_plot_proposition(name_observatory, telescope, day)

   :param name_observatory: name of the observatory (ex : 'SSO')
   :type name_observatory: str
   :param telescope: name of the telescope (exx : 'Io')
   :type telescope: str
   :param day: date of day in fmt "yyyy-mm-dd"
   :type day: date

   :returns: visibility plot on telescope at a given day
   :rtype: plot


.. function:: airmass_altitude_plot_saved(name_observatory, telescope, day)

   :param name_observatory: name of the observatory (ex : 'SSO')
   :type name_observatory: str
   :param telescope: name of the telescope (exx : 'Io')
   :type telescope: str
   :param day: date of day in fmt "yyyy-mm-dd"
   :type day: date

   :returns: visibility plot on telescope at a given day
   :rtype: plot


.. function:: airmass_altitude_plot_proposition(name_observatory, telescope, day)

   :param name_observatory: name of the observatory (ex : 'SSO')
   :type name_observatory: str
   :param telescope: name of the telescope (exx : 'Io')
   :type telescope: str
   :param day: date of day in fmt "yyyy-mm-dd"
   :type day: date

   :returns: visibility plot on telescope at a given day
   :rtype: plot


.. function:: gantt_chart_all(target_list)

   :param target_list: path of the target list
   :type target_list: path

   :returns: gant chart of all scheduled targets so far
   :rtype: plot


.. function:: gantt_chart(date_start, date_end, telescope)

   :param date_start: date start 'yyyy-mm-dd'
   :type date_start: date
   :param date_end: date start 'yyyy-mm-dd'
   :type date_end: date
   :param telescope: name of the  telescope
   :type telescope: str

   :returns: gant chart on a given range of  days
   :rtype: plot


.. function:: airmass_altitude_plot_given_target(name_observatory, day, target, path_target_list)

   :param name_observatory: name of the observatory
   :type name_observatory: str
   :param day: date in format  'yyyy-mm-dd'
   :type day: date
   :param target: name of  target
   :type target: str
   :param path_target_list: path of the target  list
   :type path_target_list: path


.. function:: constraints_scores(constraints, target, observatory, start, end)

   :param constraints: constraints
   :type constraints: astroplan.constraints
   :param target: target
   :type target: astroplan.FixedTarget
   :param observatory: astroplan.observed
   :type observatory: observatory
   :param start: start  date
   :type start: date
   :param end: end date
   :type end: date

   :returns: plot of the constraints scores
   :rtype: plot
